data.title: The Desert Wasteland and Climate Change in Mad Max: Fury Road
data.meta_description: The Desert Wasteland and Climate Change in Mad Max: Fury Road was published in The Apocalyptic Dimensions of Climate Change on page 93.
data.text:
Eckenhoff, Judith. "The Desert Wasteland and Climate Change in Mad Max: Fury Road". The Apocalyptic Dimensions of Climate Change, edited by Jan Alber, Berlin, Boston: De Gruyter, 2021, pp. 93-108. https://doi.org/10.1515/9783110730203-006

Eckenhoff, J. (2021). The Desert Wasteland and Climate Change in Mad Max: Fury Road. In J. Alber (Ed.), The Apocalyptic Dimensions of Climate Change (pp. 93-108). Berlin, Boston: De Gruyter. https://doi.org/10.1515/9783110730203-006

Eckenhoff, J. 2021. The Desert Wasteland and Climate Change in Mad Max: Fury Road. In: Alber, J. ed. The Apocalyptic Dimensions of Climate Change. Berlin, Boston: De Gruyter, pp. 93-108. https://doi.org/10.1515/9783110730203-006
